about_me.des: I work full time at CBS Interactive on a variety of their sites. My area of focus is around performance, workflow, and deployment strategy. When Iâ€™m not working I like to tinker with IoT. Outside of tech I enjoy lifting weights and traveling.

projects.browsertime: Browsertime uses Selenium NodeJS to drive the browser. It starts the browser, load a URL, executes configurable Javascripts to collect metrics, collect a HAR file.
projects.pagexray: PageXray converts a HAR file to a JSON format that is easier to read and gives some high level statistics.
projects.coach: The Coach will give advice of how your page could be better and faster. This is the modern day Yslow!
projects.sitespeedio: Sitespeed.io is a project that leverages all 3 of the previous projects as well as it has a plugin system to add your own. Generates HTML reports and can send stats to a TSDB.
